TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit Sha256 extends System.Object
public ref class Sha256 abstract sealed

summary.span: 此類別可讓您存取 Arm64 SHA256 加密內建函式

span.span: This class provides access to the Arm64 SHA256 Crypto intrinsics

summary.span: Arm64 CPU 表示藉由將 ID_AA64ISAR0_EL1.SHA2 設定為 1 (含) 以上來支援這項功能

span.span: Arm64 CPU indicate support for this feature by setting ID_AA64ISAR0_EL1.SHA2 is 1 or better
